body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ, purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo taṇhamudacchidā asesaṃ, saritaṃ sīghasaraṃ visosayitvā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo mānamudabbadhī asesaṃ, naḷasetuṃva sudubbalaṃ mahogho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa vitakkā vidhūpitā, ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ accagamā imaṃ papañcaṃ;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītalobho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītarāgo;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītadoso;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītamoho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassānusayā na santi keci, mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa darathajā na santi keci, oraṃ āgamanāya paccayāse;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa vanathajā na santi keci, vinibandhāya bhavāya hetukappā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nīvaraṇe pahāya pañca, anigho tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pakkodano duddhakhīrohamasmi, (iti dhaniyo gopo)
body.gathalast: Channā kuṭi āhito gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Andhakamakasā na vijjare, (iti dhaniyo gopo)
body.gathalast: Vuṭṭhimpi saheyyumāgataṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Baddhāsi bhisī susaṅkhatā, (iti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Attho bhisiyā na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gopī mama assavā alolā, (iti dhaniyo gopo)
body.gathalast: Tassā na suṇāmi kiñci pāpaṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Cittaṃ mama assavaṃ vimuttaṃ, (iti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Pāpaṃ pana me na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Attavetanabhatohamasmi , (iti dhaniyo gopo)
body.gathalast: Tesaṃ na suṇāmi kiñci pāpaṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāhaṃ bhatakosmi kassaci, (iti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Attho bhatiyā na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atthi vasā atthi dhenupā, (iti dhaniyo gopo)
body.gathalast: Usabhopi gavampatīdha atthi, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Natthi vasā natthi dhenupā, (iti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Usabhopi gavampatīdha natthi, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khilā nikhātā asampavedhī, (iti dhaniyo gopo)
‘‘Ninnañca thalañca pūrayanto, mahāmegho pavassi tāvadeva;
body.gathalast: Sutvā devassa vassato, imamatthaṃ dhaniyo abhāsatha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Lābhā vata no anappakā, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasāma;
body.gathalast: Saraṇaṃ taṃ upema cakkhuma, satthā no hohi tuvaṃ mahāmuni.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nandati puttehi puttimā, (iti māro pāpimā)
body.gathalast: Upadhī hi narassa nandanā, na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Socati puttehi puttimā, (iti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Upadhī hi narassa socanā, na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī’’ti.
body.gatha1: Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā, snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti;
body.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto;
Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
body.gathalast: Viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya;
body.gathalast: Anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ;
body.gathalast: Piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarena;
body.gathalast: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke, atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā;
body.gathalast: Appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
body.gatha1: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
body.gatha1: Addhā pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā;
body.gathalast: Ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Disvā suvaṇṇassa pabhassarāni, kammāraputtena suniṭṭhitāni;
body.gathalast: Saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Sabbānipetāni abhisambhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Nāgova yūthāni vivajjayitvā, sañjātakhandho padumī uḷāro;
body.gathalast: Ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhīvisūkāni upātivatto, patto niyāmaṃ paṭiladdhamaggo;
body.gathalast: Uppannañāṇomhi anaññaneyyo, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Nillolupo nikkuho nippipāso, nimmakkho niddhantakasāvamoho;
Pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha, anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha, mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca loke, analaṅkaritvā anapekkhamāno;
body.gathalast: Vibhūsanaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Saṅgo eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyo;
body.gathalast: Aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Okkhittacakkhū na ca pādalolo, guttindriyo rakkhitamānasāno;
body.gathalast: Anavassuto apariḍayhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Rasesu gedhaṃ akaraṃ alolo, anaññaposī sapadānacārī;
Pahāya pañcāvaraṇāni cetaso, upakkilese byapanujja sabbe;
Vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassaṃ;
body.gathalast: Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Āraddhavīriyo paramatthapattiyā, alīnacitto akusītavutti;
body.gathalast: Daḷhanikkamo thāmabalūpapanno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Paṭisallānaṃ jhānamariñcamāno, dhammesu niccaṃ anudhammacārī;
body.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sīhova saddesu asantasanto, vātova jālamhi asajjamāno;
Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī;
body.gathalast: Sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle;
body.gathalast: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, sandālayitvāna saṃyojanāni;
body.gathalast: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā;
body.gathalast: Attaṭṭhapaññā asucī manussā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.paragraph: Addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘ahaṃ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmi. Tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassū’’ti.
Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāma te kasiṃ;
body.gathalast: Kasiṃ no pucchito brūhi, yathā jānemu te kasiṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
body.gathalast: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kāyagutto vacīgutto, āhāre udare yato;
body.gathalast: Saccaṃ karomi niddānaṃ, soraccaṃ me pamocanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhaṃ, yogakkhemādhivāhanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Gacchati anivattantaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evamesā kasī kaṭṭhā, sā hoti amatapphalā;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ kasiṃ kasitvāna, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyyaṃ, sampassataṃ brāhmaṇa nesa dhammo;
body.gathalast: Gāthābhigītaṃ panudanti buddhā, dhamme satī brāhmaṇa vuttiresā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Aññena ca kevalinaṃ mahesiṃ, khīṇāsavaṃ kukkuccavūpasantaṃ;
body.gathalast: Annena pānena upaṭṭhahassu, khettaṃ hi taṃ puññapekkhassa hotī’’ti.
body.paragraph: ‘‘Atha kassa cāhaṃ, bho gotama, imaṃ pāyasaṃ dammī’’ti? ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā. Tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, taṃ pāyasaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapaññaṃ, (iti cundo kammāraputto)
‘‘Caturo samaṇā na pañcamatthi, (cundāti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Maggajino maggadesako ca, magge jīvati yo ca maggadūsī’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kaṃ maggajinaṃ vadanti buddhā, (iti cundo kammāraputto)
‘‘Yo tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo, nibbānābhirato anānugiddho;
body.gathalast: Lokassa sadevakassa netā, tādiṃ maggajinaṃ vadanti buddhā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paramaṃ paramanti yodha ñatvā, akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhammaṃ;
body.gatha2: Taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ muniṃ anejaṃ, dutiyaṃ bhikkhunamāhu maggadesiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo dhammapade sudesite, magge jīvati saññato satīmā;
‘‘Chadanaṃ katvāna subbatānaṃ, pakkhandī kuladūsako pagabbho;
body.gathalast: Māyāvī asaññato palāpo, patirūpena caraṃ sa maggadūsī.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho, sutavā ariyasāvako sapañño;
body.gathalast: Kathaṃ hi duṭṭhena asampaduṭṭhaṃ, suddhaṃ asuddhena samaṃ kareyyā’’ti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gathalast: Dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, paṭhamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Asantassa piyā honti, sante na kurute piyaṃ;
body.gathalast: Asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, dutiyo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Tatiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
body.gathalast: Alaso kodhapaññāṇo, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, tatiyo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Catutthaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Pahu santo na bharati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, catuttho so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Pañcamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Musāvādena vañceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, pañcamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Chaṭṭhamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pahūtavitto puriso, sahirañño sabhojano;
body.gathalast: Eko bhuñjati sādūni, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, chaṭṭhamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Sattamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jātitthaddho dhanatthaddho, gottatthaddho ca yo naro;
body.gathalast: Saññātiṃ atimaññeti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, sattamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Aṭṭhamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Itthidhutto surādhutto, akkhadhutto ca yo naro;
body.gathalast: Laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināseti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, aṭṭhamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Navamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, navamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Dasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atītayobbano poso, āneti timbarutthaniṃ;
body.gathalast: Tassā issā na supati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, dasamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Ekādasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Itthiṃ soṇḍiṃ vikiraṇiṃ, purisaṃ vāpi tādisaṃ;
‘‘Iti hetaṃ vijānāma, ekādasamo so parābhavo;
body.gathalast: Dvādasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Appabhogo mahātaṇho, khattiye jāyate kule;
body.gathalast: So ca rajjaṃ patthayati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete parābhave loke, paṇḍito samavekkhiya;
body.gathalast: Ariyo dassanasampanno, sa lokaṃ bhajate siva’’nti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesane aggi pajjalito hoti āhuti paggahitā. Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.

Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā aggikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘jānāsi pana tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme’’ti? ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ, bho gotama, jānāmi vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme; sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu, yathāhaṃ jāneyyaṃ vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme’’ti. ‘‘Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī’’ti. ‘‘Evaṃ, bho’’ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi. Bhagavā etadavoca –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kodhano upanāhī ca, pāpamakkhī ca yo naro;
body.gathalast: Vipannadiṭṭhi māyāvī, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Yassa pāṇe dayā natthi, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gāme vā yadi vā raññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na hi te iṇamatthīti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo ve kiñcikkhakamyatā, panthasmiṃ vajantaṃ janaṃ;
body.gathalast: Hantvā kiñcikkhamādeti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Sakkhipuṭṭho musā brūti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo ñātīnaṃ sakhīnaṃ vā, dāresu paṭidissati;
‘‘Yo mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā, jiṇṇakaṃ gatayobbanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pahu santo na bharati, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā, bhātaraṃ bhaginiṃ sasuṃ;
body.gathalast: Hanti roseti vācāya, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo atthaṃ pucchito santo, anatthamanusāsati;
body.gathalast: Paṭicchannena manteti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: vibha. 894 passitabbaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yo paṭicchannakammanto, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: sutvā ca (syā. ka.)sucibhojanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Āgataṃ nappaṭipūjeti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo brāhmaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ vā, aññaṃ vāpi vanibbakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Musāvādena vañceti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo brāhmaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ vā, bhattakāle upaṭṭhite;
body.gathalast: Roseti vācā na ca deti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Asataṃ yodha pabrūti, mohena paliguṇṭhito;
body.gathalast: Nihīno sena mānena, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Rosako kadariyo ca, pāpiccho maccharī saṭho;
body.gathalast: Ahiriko anottappī, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo buddhaṃ paribhāsati, atha vā tassa sāvakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Coro sabrahmake loke, eso kho vasalādhamo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete kho vasalā vuttā, mayā yete pakāsitā;
body.gatha2: Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
body.gathalast: Āgacchuṃ tassupaṭṭhānaṃ, khattiyā brāhmaṇā bahū.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Devayānaṃ abhiruyha, virajaṃ so mahāpathaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na naṃ jāti nivāresi, brahmalokūpapattiyā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjhāyakakule jātā, brāhmaṇā mantabandhavā;
body.gathalast: Te ca pāpesu kammesu, abhiṇhamupadissare.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā, samparāye ca duggati;
‘‘Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
body.gathalast: Kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo’’ti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ vutte, aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama…pe… upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata’’nti.
body.gatha1: Karaṇīyamatthakusalena, yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca;
Santussako ca subharo ca, appakicco ca sallahukavutti;
body.gathalast: Santindriyo ca nipako ca, appagabbho kulesvananugiddho.
body.gatha1: Na ca khuddamācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṃ;
Ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi, tasā vā thāvarā vanavasesā;
body.gathalast: Byārosanā paṭighasaññā, nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyya.
body.gatha1: Mātā yathā niyaṃ puttamāyusā ekaputtamanurakkhe;
body.gathalast: Evampi sabbabhūtesu, mānasaṃ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Mettañca sabbalokasmi, mānasaṃ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ;
body.gathalast: Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, asambādhaṃ averamasapattaṃ.
Etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhu.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma, sīlavā dassanena sampanno;
‘‘Ajja pannaraso uposatho, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ, handa passāma gotamaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci mano supaṇihito, (iti hemavato yakkho)
body.gathalast: Kacci iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe ca, saṅkappassa vasīkatā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mano cassa supaṇihito, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Atho iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe ca, saṅkappassa vasīkatā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci adinnaṃ nādiyati, (iti hemavato yakkho)
body.gathalast: Kacci ārā pamādamhā, kacci jhānaṃ na riñcati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na so adinnaṃ ādiyati, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Atho ārā pamādamhā, buddho jhānaṃ na riñcati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci musā na bhaṇati, (iti hemavato yakkho)
body.gathalast: Kacci vebhūtiyaṃ nāha, kacci samphaṃ na bhāsati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Musā ca so na bhaṇati, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: atthaṃ so (sī. pī. ka.)bhāsati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci na rajjati kāmesu, (iti hemavato yakkho)
body.gathalast: Kacci mohaṃ atikkanto, kacci dhammesu cakkhumā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati kāmesu, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Sabbamohaṃ atikkanto, buddho dhammesu cakkhumā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci vijjāya sampanno, (iti hemavato yakkho )
body.gathalast: Kaccissa āsavā khīṇā, kacci natthi punabbhavo’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vijjāya ceva sampanno, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Sabbassa āsavā khīṇā, natthi tassa punabbhavo’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ, kammunā byappathena ca;
body.gathalast: Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, dhammato naṃ pasaṃsati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ, kammunā byappathena ca;
body.gathalast: Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, dhammato anumodasi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ, kammunā byappathena ca;
body.gathalast: Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, handa passāma gotamaṃ.
Muniṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, ehi passāma gotamaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sīhaṃvekacaraṃ nāgaṃ, kāmesu anapekkhinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Upasaṅkamma pucchāma, maccupāsappamocanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Akkhātāraṃ pavattāraṃ, sabbadhammāna pāraguṃ;
body.gathalast: Buddhaṃ verabhayātītaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kismiṃ loko samuppanno, (iti hemavato yakkho)
body.gathalast: Kissa loko upādāya, kismiṃ loko vihaññati’’.
Channameva upādāya, chasu loko vihaññati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Katamaṃ taṃ upādānaṃ, yattha loko vihaññati;
‘‘Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, manochaṭṭhā paveditā;
body.gathalast: Ettha chandaṃ virājetvā, evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Etaṃ lokassa niyyānaṃ, akkhātaṃ vo yathātathaṃ;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi, evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ko sūdha tarati oghaṃ, kodha tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Appatiṭṭhe anālambe, ko gambhīre na sīdati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbadā sīlasampanno, paññavā susamāhito;
‘‘Virato kāmasaññāya, sabbasaṃyojanātigo;
body.gathalast: Nandībhavaparikkhīṇo, so gambhīre na sīdati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gabbhīrapaññaṃ nipuṇatthadassiṃ, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ passatha sabbadhi vippamuttaṃ, dibbe pathe kamamānaṃ mahesiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Anomanāmaṃ nipuṇatthadassiṃ, paññādadaṃ kāmālaye asattaṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ passatha sabbaviduṃ sumedhaṃ, ariye pathe kamamānaṃ mahesiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sudiṭṭhaṃ vata no ajja, suppabhātaṃ suhuṭṭhitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yaṃ addasāma sambuddhaṃ, oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ime dasasatā yakkhā, iddhimanto yasassino;
body.gathalast: Sabbe taṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, tvaṃ no satthā anuttaro.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ;
body.gathalast: Namassamānā sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammata’’nti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane. Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā nikkhami. ‘‘Pavisa, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā pāvisi.
Dutiyampi kho…pe… tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā nikkhami. ‘‘Pavisa, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā pāvisi.
Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ , āvuso, nikkhamissāmi. Yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohī’’ti.
‘‘Pañhaṃ taṃ, samaṇa, pucchissāmi. Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī’’ti.

‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya. Api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī’’ti. Atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti;
‘‘Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
body.gathalast: Saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ su tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃ su tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kathaṃ su dukkhamacceti, kathaṃ su parisujjhati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhā tarati oghaṃ, appamādena aṇṇavaṃ;
‘‘Kathaṃ su labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃ su vindate dhanaṃ;
body.gatha2: Kathaṃ su kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
body.gathalast: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddahāno arahataṃ, dhammaṃ nibbānapattiyā;
‘‘Patirūpakārī dhuravā, uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yassete caturo dhammā, saddhassa gharamesino;
‘‘Iṅgha aññepi pucchassu, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
body.gathalast: Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
‘‘Atthāya vata me buddho, vāsāyāḷavimāgamā;
body.gathalast: aṭṭhinhārūhi saṃyutto (syā. ka.)ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
body.gathalast: Namassamāno sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammata’’nti.
body.gatha1: Caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Samiñjeti pasāreti, esā kāyassa iñjanā.
body.gatha1: Aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto, tacamaṃsāvalepano;
body.gathalast: Chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno, yathābhūtaṃ na dissati.
Hadayassa papphāsassa, vakkassa pihakassa ca.
body.gatha1: Siṅghāṇikāya kheḷassa, sedassa ca medassa ca;
body.gathalast: Lohitassa lasikāya, pittassa ca vasāya ca.
body.gatha1: Athassa navahi sotehi, asucī savati sabbadā;
body.gathalast: Akkhimhā akkhigūthako, kaṇṇamhā kaṇṇagūthako.
body.gatha1: Siṅghāṇikā ca nāsato, mukhena vamatekadā;
body.gathalast: Pittaṃ semhañca vamati, kāyamhā sedajallikā.
body.gatha1: Athassa susiraṃ sīsaṃ, matthaluṅgassa pūritaṃ;
body.gathalast: Subhato naṃ maññati, bālo avijjāya purakkhato.
body.gatha1: Yadā ca so mato seti, uddhumāto vinīlako;
body.gathalast: Apaviddho susānasmiṃ, anapekkhā honti ñātayo.
Kākā gijjhā ca khādanti, ye caññe santi pāṇino.
body.gatha1: Sutvāna buddhavacanaṃ, bhikkhu paññāṇavā idha;
body.gathalast: So kho naṃ parijānāti, yathābhūtañhi passati.
body.gatha1: Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaye.
body.gatha1: Chandarāgaviratto so, bhikkhu paññāṇavā idha;
body.gathalast: Ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ padamaccutaṃ.
Nānākuṇapaparipūro, vissavanto tato tato.
Paraṃ vā avajāneyya, kimaññatra adassanāti.
Aniketamasanthavaṃ, etaṃ ve munidassanaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo jātamucchijja na ropayeyya, jāyantamassa nānuppavecche;
body.gathalast: Tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ, addakkhi so santipadaṃ mahesi.
Sa ve munī jātikhayantadassī, takkaṃ pahāya na upeti saṅkhaṃ.
body.gatha1: Aññāya sabbāni nivesanāni, anikāmayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sa ve munī vītagedho agiddho, nāyūhatī pāragato hi hoti.
body.gatha1: Sabbābhibhuṃ sabbaviduṃ sumedhaṃ, sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittaṃ;
Paññābalaṃ sīlavatūpapannaṃ, samāhitaṃ jhānarataṃ satīmaṃ;
body.gathalast: Saṅgā pamuttaṃ akhilaṃ anāsavaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Ekaṃ carantaṃ munimappamattaṃ, nindāpasaṃsāsu avedhamānaṃ;
body.gatha2: Sīhaṃva saddesu asantasantaṃ, vātaṃva jālamhi asajjamānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
Taṃ vītarāgaṃ susamāhitindriyaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yo ve ṭhitatto tasaraṃva ujju, jigucchati kammehi pāpakehi;
body.gathalast: Vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañca, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
na roseti (syā.), taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yadaggato majjhato sesato vā, piṇḍaṃ labhetha paradattūpajīvī;
body.gathalast: Nālaṃ thutuṃ nopi nipaccavādī, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Muniṃ carantaṃ virataṃ methunasmā, yo yobbane nopanibajjhate kvaci;
body.gathalast: Madappamādā virataṃ vippamuttaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Aññāya lokaṃ paramatthadassiṃ, oghaṃ samuddaṃ atitariya tādiṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ chinnaganthaṃ asitaṃ anāsavaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
Evaṃ gihī nānukaroti bhikkhuno, munino vivittassa vanamhi jhāyatoti.
body.paragraph: Tassuddānaṃ –
body.gatha1: Urago dhaniyo ceva, visāṇañca tathā kasi;
body.gathalast: Cundo parābhavo ceva, vasalo mettabhāvanā.
body.gatha1: Sātāgiro āḷavako, vijayo ca tathā muni;
body.gathalast: Dvādasetāni suttāni, uragavaggoti vuccatīti.
